traits.name: Brave
traits.desc: Baric has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

actions.name: Maul
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage. Baric carries twenty crossbow bolts.
